thread.title: Carlos Sainz hopes to race despite serious accident in Russian practice - Ledbury Reporter

author: Source: Ledbury Reporter
title: Carlos Sainz hopes to race despite serious accident in Russian practice - Ledbury Reporter
text:
Spanish Formula One driver Carlos Sainz is hopeful of returning to action for Sunday's Russian Grand Prix after surviving a harrowing 200mph shunt in final practice. Sainz, who is contesting his debut season in the sport, was airlifted to a nearby hospital in Sochi after the crash on Saturday morning.
 Ledbury Reporter.
